txt.en: 'A smith is only as good as his smithy, and a smithy is only as good as the tools and equipment it holds. There is much we can do to outfit our smithy with new equipment and more tools to allow more smiths to be able to work the forges.'
'Hytbold is one step closer to being rebuilt and restored.'
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
Bring the Tokens of Hytbold to Hereswith
